  • Element
com.tedros.fxapi.annotation.chart

Annotation Type TAxis


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=ANNOTATION_TYPE)
public @interface TAxis

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      TAxisType axisType
      The axis type
      java.lang.String label
      The axis label

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean animated
      When true any changes to the axis and its range will be animated.
      boolean autoRanging
      This is true when the axis determines its range from the data automatically
      double endMargin
      The margin between the last tick mark and the axis end Only for TAxisType.STRING or TAxisType.DATE
      boolean forceZeroInRange
      Sets the value of the property forceZeroInRange.
      boolean gapStartAndEnd
      If this is true then half the space between ticks is left at the start and end Only for TAxisType.STRING or TAxisType.DATE
      int minorTickCount
      The number of minor tick divisions to be displayed between each major tick mark.
      int minorTickLength
      The length of minor tick mark lines.
      boolean minorTickVisible
      true if minor tick marks should be displayed Only for TAxisType.NUMBER
      javafx.geometry.Side side
      The side of the plot which this axis is being drawn on
      double startMargin
      The margin between the axis start and the first tick-mark Only for TAxisType.STRING or TAxisType.DATE
      java.lang.String tickLabelFill
      The fill for all tick labels
      TFont tickLabelFont
      The font for all tick labels
      double tickLabelGap
      The gap between tick labels and the tick mark lines
      double tickLabelRotation
      Rotation in degrees of tick mark labels from their normal horizontal.
      boolean tickLabelsVisible
      true if tick mark labels should be displayed
      double tickLength
      The length of tick mark lines
      boolean tickMarkVisible
      true if tick marks should be displayed
      int tickUnit
      The value between each major tick mark in data units.

    • Element Detail

      • axisType

        public abstract TAxisType axisType
        The axis type

      • label

        public abstract java.lang.String label
        The axis label

      • minorTickCount

        public abstract int minorTickCount
        The number of minor tick divisions to be displayed between each major tick mark. The number of actual minor tick marks will be one less than this. Only for TAxisType.NUMBER
        Default:
        1

      • minorTickLength

        public abstract int minorTickLength
        The length of minor tick mark lines. Set to 0 to not display minor tick marks. Only for TAxisType.NUMBER
        Default:
        1

      • minorTickVisible

        public abstract boolean minorTickVisible
        true if minor tick marks should be displayed Only for TAxisType.NUMBER
        Default:
        true

      • tickUnit

        public abstract int tickUnit
        The value between each major tick mark in data units. Only for TAxisType.NUMBER
        Default:
        10

      • tickLabelFill

        public abstract java.lang.String tickLabelFill
        The fill for all tick labels
        Default:
        "#ffffff"

      • tickLabelGap

        public abstract double tickLabelGap
        The gap between tick labels and the tick mark lines
        Default:
        22.0

      • tickLabelRotation

        public abstract double tickLabelRotation
        Rotation in degrees of tick mark labels from their normal horizontal.
        Default:
        30.0

      • tickMarkVisible

        public abstract boolean tickMarkVisible
        true if tick marks should be displayed
        Default:
        true

      • tickLabelFont

        public abstract TFont tickLabelFont
        The font for all tick labels
        Default:
        @com.tedros.fxapi.annotation.text.TFont

      • tickLabelsVisible

        public abstract boolean tickLabelsVisible
        true if tick mark labels should be displayed
        Default:
        true

      • forceZeroInRange

        public abstract boolean forceZeroInRange
        Sets the value of the property forceZeroInRange. Property description: When true zero is always included in the visible range. This only has effect if auto-ranging is on. Only for TAxisType.NUMBER
        Default:
        false

      • autoRanging

        public abstract boolean autoRanging
        This is true when the axis determines its range from the data automatically
        Default:
        true

      • tickLength

        public abstract double tickLength
        The length of tick mark lines
        Default:
        -1.0

      • side

        public abstract javafx.geometry.Side side
        The side of the plot which this axis is being drawn on
        Default:
        javafx.geometry.Side.BOTTOM

      • animated

        public abstract boolean animated
        When true any changes to the axis and its range will be animated.
        Default:
        true

      • startMargin

        public abstract double startMargin
        The margin between the axis start and the first tick-mark Only for TAxisType.STRING or TAxisType.DATE
        Default:
        -1.0

      • endMargin

        public abstract double endMargin
        The margin between the last tick mark and the axis end Only for TAxisType.STRING or TAxisType.DATE
        Default:
        -1.0

      • gapStartAndEnd

        public abstract boolean gapStartAndEnd
        If this is true then half the space between ticks is left at the start and end Only for TAxisType.STRING or TAxisType.DATE
        Default:
        false
